testcase.classname: Testing the settings page: testing some general stuff,
testcase.name: should give the settings page

testcase.classname: Testing the settings page: testing some general stuff,
testcase.name: initially there should be no components

testcase.classname: Testing the settings page: testing some general stuff,
testcase.name: expect a title attribute

testcase.classname: Testing the settings page: testing some general stuff,
testcase.name: expect to have "App Settings" in the title

testcase.classname: Testing the settings page: testing some general stuff,
testcase.name: should have "New Apps" button

testcase.classname: Testing the settings page: test the new apps page:
testcase.name: should have a bundle list

testcase.classname: Testing the settings page: test the new apps page:
testcase.name: should have at least 1 bundle in the list

testcase.classname: Testing the settings page: test the new apps page:
testcase.name: should have a button to return to the "App Settings"

testcase.classname: Testing the settings page: test the bundle list:
testcase.name: should have an id

testcase.classname: Testing the settings page: test the bundle list: checking the data attributes of the bundle items:
testcase.name: should have the data attribute "name"

testcase.classname: Testing the settings page: test the bundle list: checking the data attributes of the bundle items:
testcase.name: should have the data attribute "location"

testcase.classname: Testing the settings page: test the bundle list: checking the data attributes of the bundle items:
testcase.name: should have the data attribute "pid"

testcase.classname: Testing the settings page: test the bundle list: checking the data attributes of the bundle items:
testcase.name: should have the data attribute "hasFpid"

testcase.classname: Testing the settings page: test the bundle list: checking the data attributes of the bundle items:
testcase.name: should have the data attribute "hasFactory"

testcase.classname: Testing the settings page: test the bundle list: checking the data attributes of the bundle items:
testcase.name: should have the data attribute "hasConfigurations"

testcase.classname: Testing the settings page: test the configuration panel:
testcase.name: should have an add button

testcase.classname: Testing the settings page: test the configuration panel:
testcase.name: should show the configuration panel when clicking on the add button

testcase.classname: Testing the settings page: test the configuration panel:
testcase.name: should have a close button

testcase.classname: Testing the settings page: test the configuration panel:
testcase.name: should have a title

testcase.classname: Testing the settings page: test the configuration panel:
testcase.name: should have the correct text in the title

testcase.classname: Testing the settings page: test the configuration panel:
testcase.name: should have at least 1 configuration option

testcase.classname: Testing the settings page: test the configuration panel:
testcase.name: should return to the "App Settings" page when clicking the "Create new" button

testcase.classname: Testing the settings page: test the data attributes of the configuration options:
testcase.name: should have the data attribute "defaultValue"

testcase.classname: Testing the settings page: test the data attributes of the configuration options:
testcase.name: should have the data attribute "id"

testcase.classname: Testing the settings page: test the data attributes of the configuration options:
testcase.name: should have the data attribute "isRequired"

testcase.classname: Testing the settings page: test the data attributes of the configuration options:
testcase.name: should have the data attribute "name"

testcase.classname: Testing the settings page: test the data attributes of the configuration options:
testcase.name: should have the data attribute "optionLabels"

testcase.classname: Testing the settings page: test the data attributes of the configuration options:
testcase.name: should have the data attribute "optionValues"

testcase.classname: Testing the settings page: test the data attributes of the configuration options:
testcase.name: should have the data attribute "type"

testcase.classname: Testing the settings page: test the data attributes of the configuration options:
testcase.name: should have the correct text in the label

testcase.classname: Testing the settings page: test the data attributes of the configuration options:
testcase.name: should have the correct default value set

testcase.classname: Testing the settings page: test the "Create New" button attributes of the config panel:
testcase.name: should have the 'bundle-id' attribute

testcase.classname: Testing the settings page: test the "Create New" button attributes of the config panel:
testcase.name: should have the 'location' attribute

testcase.classname: Testing the settings page: test the "Create New" button attributes of the config panel:
testcase.name: should have the 'has-factory' attribute

testcase.classname: Testing the settings page: test the "Create New" button attributes of the config panel:
testcase.name: should have the 'has-fpid' attribute

testcase.classname: Testing the settings page: test the "Create New" button attributes of the config panel:
testcase.name: should have the text "Create new"

testcase.classname: Testing the settings page: test canceling the create of a new app,
testcase.name: should return to the "New App" page when hitting the close button

testcase.classname: Testing the settings page: test canceling the create of a new app,
testcase.name: should return to the "New App" page when clicking outside the config panel
